A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This was a disappointing movie at best. The story made no sense. The humor was forced. And the characters that we have grown to love and know are not themselves at all. There were whole segments without any points to them at all. The way they showed force strength in some individuals was very unrealistic with what we know the Jedi powers to be in every movie\, comic\, and book ever. Overall this movie is the greatest disappointment of our lives.
